name: TempleSinai
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to daily updates from your favorite source. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

If you have suggestions for new ways to use this skill please share them with Rabbi Jay at the Temple.
If you would like to schedule time to discuss what's on your mind with the Rabbi, Cantor, Morah Erica (for Religious School and Teen Programs), Morah Phyllis (the ECEC) or Larry (Congregational Engagement), just call or email the Temple Sinai Office. 

You can find all of this and more at the Temple Website - www.templesinaistamford.org
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
